languages.text: {n}Фыркнув, Абеляр отчаянно борется с незваной улыбкой.{/n} "Помилуй Император. Почтенного магоса поймали на незнании молитвы, и он мнется, как кадет на экзамене. Не думал, что увижу подобное".

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."
languages.original_text: {n}Фыркнув, Абеляр отчаянно борется с незваной улыбкой.{/n} "Помилуй Император. Почтенного магоса поймали на незнании молитвы, и он мнется, как кадет на экзамене. Не думал, что увижу подобное".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. An honourable Magos got called out on not knowing a prayer and now he's floundering like a cadet on an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. An honourable Magos got called out on not knowing a prayer and now he's floundering like a cadet on an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. An honourable Magos got called out on not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet on an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. An honourable Magos got called out on not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet on an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

{n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

languages.text: {n}Abelard schnaubt und unterdrückt mühsam ein unfreiwilliges Lächeln.{/n} "Der Imperator helfe uns! Der ehrenhafte Magos wurde dabei ertappt, dass er ein Gebet nicht kennt, und jetzt stammelt er wie ein Kadett beim Examen. Dass ich diesen Tag noch erleben darf!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard schnaubt und unterdrückt mühsam ein unfreiwilliges Lächeln.{/n} "Der Imperator helfe uns! Ein ehrenhafter Magos kennt ein Gebet nicht, und jetzt stammelt er wie ein Kadett beim Examen. Dass ich diesen Tag noch erleben darf!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard retient un petit rire et lutte pour ne pas sourire malgré lui.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous garde. Le vénérable magos a dû avouer qu'il ne connaissait pas une prière, et le voilà qui patauge comme un cadet un jour d'examen. Je n'aurais jamais cru assister à ce spectacle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard retient un petit rire et lutte pour ne pas sourire malgré lui.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous garde. Un honorable magos a dû avouer qu'il ne connaissait pas une prière, et le voilà qui patauge comme un cadet un jour d'examen. Je n'aurais jamais cru assister à ce spectacle. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德哼了一声，努力克制住不自觉流露出的笑容。{/n}“帝皇在上，帮帮我们吧。这位尊贵的贤者居然会因为不知道祷词而手足无措，他现在就像临阵抱佛脚的学生一样慌慌张张。我从来没想过居然会看到这样的场面。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德哼了一声，努力克制住不自觉流露出的笑容。{/n}“帝皇在上，帮帮我们吧。一位尊贵的贤者，居然会因为不知道祷词而手足无措，现在他就像临阵磨枪的学生一样慌慌张张。我从来没想过居然会看到这样的场面。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは鼻を鳴らし、無意識の笑顔を抑え込もうとする。{/n}「皇帝よ我らを救いたまえ。誉れ高きマゴスが祈りを知らないことがバレ、試験に臨む士官候補生のように四苦八苦するとは。こんな日が来るとは思ってもみませんでしたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは鼻を鳴らし、無意識の笑顔を抑え込もうとする。{/n}「なんたることだ。誉れ高きマゴスが祈りを知らずに呼び出され、試験に臨む士官候補生のように四苦八苦するとは。こんな日が来るとは思ってもみなかった」

languages.text: {n}Abelard resopla y lucha por reprimir una sonrisa involuntaria.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos asista. El estimado magos no se sabe un rezo y ahora tiembla como un cadete en un examen. Nunca creí que vería tal cosa».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard resopla y lucha por reprimir una sonrisa involuntaria.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos asista. Reprenden a un ilustre magos por no saberse un rezo y ahora tiembla como un cadete en un examen. Nunca creí que vería tal cosa».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, pofurdanarak yüzündeki istem dışı gülümsemeyi bastırmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "İmparator yardımcımız olsun. Saygıdeğer Magos'un duayı bilmemesi meydana çıkmakla kalmadı, bir de imtihana girmiş talebe gibi kızarıp bozarıyor. Gözünle göreceksin deseler inanmazdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard snorts and struggles to suppress an involuntary smile.{/n} "Emperor help us all. The esteemed Magos has been caught out not knowing a prayer, and now he's floundering like a cadet in an exam. I never thought I'd see the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, homurdanarak yüzündeki istem dışı gülümsemeyi bastırmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Ey İmparator, yardımını bizden esirgeme! Saygıdeğer Magos'un duayı bilmemesi yetmedi, şimdi bir de imtihana girmiş bir talebe gibi bocalıyor. Gözünle göreceksin deseler inanmazdım."
